wota.gameobjects

Class AntAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • wota.gameobjects.AI
      • wota.gameobjects.AntAI

  • public abstract class AntAI
extends wota.gameobjects.AI
    Basisclass for antais by the user. Contains several lists describing the objects which are visible to the ant.

    • Method Detail

      • moveInDirection

        protected void moveInDirection(double direction)
        Move in certain direction with maximum distance
        Parameters:
        direction - measured in degrees (0 = East, 90 = North, 180 = West, 270 = South)

      • moveInDirection

        protected void moveInDirection(double direction,
                   double distance)
        Move in direction with specified distance
        Parameters:
        direction - measured in degrees (0 = East, 90 = North, 180 = West, 270 = South)
        distance - distance to move in one tick

      • moveToward

        protected void moveToward(wota.utility.Vector target)
        Move toward absolute position on the map. Stops when position is reached.
        Parameters:
        target - absolute coordinates, NOT relatve to Ant

      • moveToward

        protected void moveToward(wota.gameobjects.Snapshot target)
        Move in direction of an Object Stops when target is reached.
        Parameters:
        target - can be anything like Ant, Sugar, ...

      • moveToward

        protected void moveToward(wota.gameobjects.Snapshot target,
              double distance)
        Move in direction of target but only the specified distance.
        Parameters:
        target - Target to move towards.

      • moveAhead

        protected void moveAhead()
        Move in the same direction like last tick. Moves in direction 0 if this is the first tick.

      • moveHome

        protected void moveHome()
        Move maximal distance in direction of the own hill, even if it is not visible.

      • attack

        protected void attack(wota.gameobjects.Ant target)
        Attack target of type Ant. Makes you drop sugar.

      • pickUpSugar

        protected void pickUpSugar(wota.gameobjects.Sugar source)
        Pick up sugar. Works only if you are close enough to source.

      • dropSugar

        protected void dropSugar()
        drop sugar e.g. to run faster. Cannot be picked up again.

      • talk

        protected void talk(int content)
        Send message of type int. Can be heard by close friendly ants and hill.

      • talk

        protected void talk(int content,
        wota.gameobjects.Snapshot snapshot)
        Send message of both int and Snaphshot (Ant, Hill, Sugar, ...)

      • getLastMovementDirection

        protected double getLastMovementDirection()
        get the direction of the last movement in degrees.
        Returns:
        direction of last movement. 0 if this is the first tick.
